txt.en: The remnants of the ancient vessel before you are inscribed with crude runes. \n\nPerhaps you should deliver these remnants to Mair among the cairns.
'These pieces appear to be from an ancient urn of my people. These remnants speak of a place to capture a darkness that whispers to others.\n\n'I wonder what that means?'
You discovered the remnants of an ancient rune-covered vessel among the cairns.
Talk to Mair among the cairns
Mair is posted among the cairns in the Bonevales.\n\nYou should bring the remnants of the vessel to Mair.
